languages.text: "Простите мне эту небольшую ложь, Вольный Торговец. Вы, как никто друг{mf|ой|ая}, поспособствовали освобождению Дома Орселлио — за что я вечно буду вам благодарен. В иное время, в ином месте мы могли бы стать добрыми друзьями".

traits.locale_text: "Простите мне эту небольшую ложь, Вольный Торговец. Вы, как никто друг{mf|ой|ая}, поспособствовали освобождению Дома Орселлио — за что я вечно буду вам благодарен. В иное время, в ином месте мы могли бы стать добрыми друзьями".

languages.text: "Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."
languages.original_text: "Простите мне эту небольшую ложь, Вольный Торговец. Вы, как никто друг{mf|ой|ая}, поспособствовали освобождению Дома Орселлио — за что я вечно буду вам благодарен. В иное время, в ином месте мы могли бы стать добрыми друзьями".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will be forever grateful. We could have been good friends in another time and another place."

"Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will be forever grateful. We could have been good friends in another time and another place."

"Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

"Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

"Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

"Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

languages.text: "Verzeiht mir diese kleine Lüge, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr habt der noblen Sache, Haus Orsellio zu befreien, gedient wie kein anderer. Dafür werde ich Euch ewig dankbar sein. In einem anderen Leben hätten wir gute Freunde werden können."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht mir diese kleine Lüge, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr habt der noblen Sache, Haus Orsellio zu befreien, gedient wie kein anderer. Dafür werde ich Euch ewig dankbar sein. In einem anderen Leben hätten wir gute Freunde werden können."

languages.text: « Veuillez me pardonner ce petit mensonge, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous avez servi une noble cause en libérant la maison Orsellio comme personne, ce dont je vous serai éternellement reconnaissant. Nous aurions pu devenir bons amis dans une autre vie. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez me pardonner ce petit mensonge, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous avez servi une noble cause en libérant la maison Orsellio comme personne, ce dont je vous serai éternellement reconnaissant. Nous aurions pu devenir bons amis dans une autre vie. »

languages.text: “请原谅我小小的谎言。行商浪人。您做出了无与伦比的贡献，解放了奥赛罗家族，我会永远赶紧您的壮举。如果还有下辈子的话，我们会成为好朋友的。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我小小的谎言。行商浪人。您做出了无与伦比的贡献，解放了奥塞罗家族，我会永远赶紧您的壮举。如果还有下辈子的话，我们会成为好朋友的。”

languages.text: 「こんな些細な嘘は大目に見てくれ、自由開拓者殿。あなたは崇高な目的、オーセリオ家の解放に努めてくれた。このことは未来永劫、感謝しよう。状況が違えば、親友になれてたかもしれないな」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな些細な嘘は大目に見てくれ、自由開拓者殿。あなたは崇高な目的に手を貸して、何よりオーセリオ家の解放に努めてくれた。このことは未来永劫、感謝しよう。生まれ変われば、親しい友人にでもなれるだろう」
「こんな些細な嘘は大目に見てくれ、自由開拓者殿。あなたは崇高な目的、オーセリオ家の解放に努めてくれた。このことは未来永劫、感謝しよう。状況が違えば、親友になれてたかもしれないな」

languages.text: «Perdóneme esta mentirijilla, Comerciante Independiente. Ha servido como nadie a la causa de la liberación de la casa Orsellio, por lo que le estaré agradecido eternamente. En otra vida, podríamos haber sido grandes amigos».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

traits.locale_text: «Perdóneme esta mentirijilla, Comerciante Independiente. Ha servido como nadie a la causa de la liberación de la casa Orsellio, por lo que le estaré agradecido eternamente. En otra vida, podríamos haber sido grandes amigos».

languages.text: "Beyaz yalanımı mazur gör Hür Tacir. Asil bir amaca hizmet ettin, Orsellio Hanesi'ni özgür kıldın. Bil ki ebediyen minnettar kalacağım. Farklı koşullarda tanışsak yakın dost bile olabilirdik."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me this little lie, Rogue Trader. You served the noble cause of liberating House Orsellio like no other, for which I will forever be grateful. We could have become close friends in another life."

traits.locale_text: "Beyaz yalanımı mazur gör Hür Tacir. Asil bir amaca hizmet ettin, Orsellio Hanesi'ni özgür kıldın. Bil ki ebediyen minnettar kalacağım. Farklı koşullarda tanışsak yakın dost bile olabilirdik."
